member.name: T:Windows.System.UserProfile.LockScreen
member.summary: Provides properties and methods to manage the full-screen image used as the lock screen background.

member.name: P:Windows.System.UserProfile.LockScreen.OriginalImageFile
member.summary: Gets the current lock screen image.
member.returns: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the lock screen image.

member.name: M:Windows.System.UserProfile.LockScreen.GetImageStream
member.summary: Gets the current lock screen image as a data stream.
member.returns: The stream that contains the lock screen image data.

member.name: M:Windows.System.UserProfile.LockScreen.RequestSetImageFeedAsync(Windows.Foundation.Uri)
member.summary: Registers an RSS image feed to be used as a lock screen slideshow. (Windows 8.1 only)
member.param: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the RSS image feed.

member.name: M:Windows.System.UserProfile.LockScreen.SetImageFileAsync(Windows.Storage.IStorageFile)
member.summary: Sets the lock screen image from a StorageFile object.
member.param: The StorageFile object that contains the new image for the lock screen.
member.returns: The object used to set the image for the lock screen.

member.name: M:Windows.System.UserProfile.LockScreen.SetImageStreamAsync(Windows.Storage.Streams.IRandomAccessStream)
member.summary: Sets the lock screen image from a data stream.
member.param: The stream that contains the image data.
member.returns: The object used to set the lock screen image.

member.name: M:Windows.System.UserProfile.LockScreen.TryRemoveImageFeed
member.summary: Unregisters the image feed being used in the lock screen slideshow, stopping the slideshow. (Windows 8.1 only)
member.returns: **true** if the image feed was disabled; otherwise, **false**.
